text: Echo is an American TV miniseries that is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name, the series was released on Disney+ and Hulu on January 9, 2024. It is the tenth MCU TV series to be produced by Marvel Studios. It stars Alaqua Cox as Maya Lopez / Echo. The series got mixed to positive reviews. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2024 American television series debuts Category:American television spin-offs Category:Disney+ original television series Category:Hulu original series Category:English-language television programs Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:Superhero television shows
title: Echo (miniseries)
